resources.string: Welcome to the Emergency Room Satisfaction App.\nWe thank you for taking the time to answer a quick survey about your visit at our hospital.
Your answers were submitted successfully.\n Your opinion matters to us, and we appreciate your time.\nThank you.
What was the date of your visit?
Around what time did you arrive at the emergency room?
Around what time did you leave the emergency room?
How likely are you to recommend our emergency room to others?
Overall, how satisfied are you with your visit to our emergency room?
Which words would you choose to describe your visit?
On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being extremely unsatisfied and 10 being extremely satisfied, how satisfied were you with the nurse(s) you interacted with?
On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being extremely unsatisfied and 10 being extremely satisfied, how satisfied were you with the doctor you interacted with?
On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being extremely unsatisfied and 10 being extremely satisfied, how satisfied were you with the quality of the waiting room?

On a scale of 1 to 10 with 1 being extremely unsatisfied and 10 being extremely satisfied, if you received tests (urine, blood, etc.) or x-rays, how satisfied were you with the staff you interacted with for these tests?

On a scale of 1 to 5 with 1 being strongly disagree, 3 being neutral and 5 being strongly agree, how do you feel about the following statement?\nThe staff I interacted with during my visit treated me with respect.
On a scale of 1 to 5 with 1 being strongly disagree, 3 being neutral and 5 being strongly agree, how do you feel about the following statement?\nThe hospital was kept clean.
Please provide any clarifications to previous ratings or comments below.
